title: China closes record number of personal data breaches, moots facial recognition law

title: This bank's new app security feature irks customers
description: OCBC introduces a security feature that locks out access if it detects mobile apps downloaded from unofficial app stores on the user's phone. The bank cites the need to safeguard against malware but is instead frustrating customers.
